product_name: Shebeest Divine Flourish Bike Jersey - Women's
long_description: Silky, breathable fabric, stretchy side panels and a second-skin fit are why you'll find the women's Shebeest Divine Flourish Bike Jersey lives up to its name. SportSylk(TM) polyester/spandex fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection and all-day performance; side panels stretch with your moves. Front 6 in. reverse-coil zipper provides ventilation. The middle of the 3 rear slide-in pockets has a sweat-resistant liner to protect your electronics. Shebeest Divine Flourish Bike Jersey features elastic-free armholes and hem for comfort.
short_description: Silky, breathable fabric, stretchy side panels and a second-skin fit are why you'll find the women's Shebeest Divine Flourish Bike Jersey lives up to its name.
